price: Tàbí (Allāhu) kò lè gbá wọn mú lórí ìrìnkè-rindò wọn ni? Wọn kò sì níí mórí bọ́.
arabic: أَوۡ يَأۡخُذَهُمۡ فِي تَقَلُّبِهِمۡ فَمَا هُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: aw yakhudhahum fī taqallubihim famā hum bimuʿ'jizīna
